TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IExtensibleDataObject

summary.span: 提供一个数据结构，用于存储 在反序列化一个用 属性标记的类型期间遇到的额外数据。

span.span: Provides a data structure to store extra data encountered by the during deserialization of a type marked with the attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口提供了单个属性，该属性设置或返回一个用于存储数据协定外部数据的结构。The interface provides a single property that sets or returns a structure used to store data that is external to a data contract. 额外数据存储在 类的实例中，并且通过 属性访问。The extra data is stored in an instance of the class and accessed through the property. 在接收、处理和返回数据的往返操作中，额外数据被原封不动地返回到原始发送方。In a roundtrip operation where data is received, processed, and sent back, the extra data is sent back to the original sender intact. 这可用于存储从协定的将来版本接收的数据。This is useful to store data received from future versions of the contract. 如果您没有实现该接口，则会在往返操作中忽略和丢弃任何额外数据。If you do not implement the interface, any extra data is ignored and discarded during a roundtrip operation. ### 使用此版本管理功能To use this versioning feature 1. 在类中实现 接口。Implement the interface in a class. 2. 将 属性添加到您的类型中。Add the property to your type. 3. 将类型 的一个私有成员添加到该类中。Add a private member of type to the class. 4. 使用新的私有成员为该属性实现 get 和 set 方法。Implement get and set methods for the property using the new private member. 5. 将 属性应用于该类。Apply the attribute to the class. 如有必要，将 和 属性设置为适当的值。Set the and properties to appropriate values if necessary. 有关版本控制的类型的详细信息，请参阅[数据协定版本管理](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-versioning.md)。For more information about versioning of types, see [Data Contract Versioning](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-versioning.md). 有关创建向前兼容的数据协定的信息，请参阅[向前兼容的数据协定](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/forward-compatible-data-contracts.md)。For information about creating forward-compatible data contracts, see [Forward-Compatible Data Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/forward-compatible-data-contracts.md). 有关数据协定的详细信息，请参阅[使用数据协定](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md)。For more information about data contracts, see [Using Data Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md). ## Examples 下面的代码演示了一个类型 (`PersonVersion2`) 的实例，该类型是可序列化类型 (`Person`) 的第二个版本。The following code shows an instance of a type (`PersonVersion2`) that is the second version of a serializable type (`Person`). 第二个版本包含第一个版本中没有的额外数据（`ID` 字段）。The second version contains extra data (`ID` field) that is not present in the first version. [!code-csharp[IUnknownSerializationData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/iunknownserializationdata/cs/iunknownserialization.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IUnknownSerializationData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/iunknownserializationdata/vb/iunknownserialization.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Runtime::Serialization::ExtensionDataObject ^ ExtensionData { System::Runtime::Serialization::ExtensionDataObject ^ get(); void set(System::Runtime::Serialization::ExtensionDataObject ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置包含额外数据的结构。

span.span: Gets or sets the structure that contains extra data.

value.span: 一个 ，它包含不被视为属于数据协定的数据。

span.span: An that contains data that is not recognized as belonging to the data contract.
